when:
Thursday 11th July 2024 Sponsors' Evening
Friday 12th July 2024 6pm - 11pm
Saturday 13th July 2024 Noon - 11pm
howmuch:
£6 door entry (includes glass)
Tokens are £2 each
1 token for a half pint of beer/cider
2 tokens for a pint of beer/cider
2 tokens for a single gin
4 tokens for a double gin
Soft Drinks are FREE
food: Food from Naz's Spice Lounge and Lymm Roundtable BBQ will be available to purchase.

brews.name: Wheels Up!
brews.description: A summer session beer, light and refreshing quaffer. Citra and Mosaic, what could go wrong?

brews.name: Beach House
brews.description: Hopped with Simcoe, Mosaic and Motueka, notes of Citrus, Stone Fruit & Lime.

brews.name: Clouded Eyes
brews.description: A soft juicy Pale Ale, hopped with El Dorado & Ekuanot.

brews.name: Hazy Afternoon
brews.description: (NEW) Citra Summer Pale

brews.name: Hoppy Pale
brews.description: A modern session pale ale, hopped with Amarillo, Citra and Moasaic - plenty of tropical wallop, but with an all-dayer percentage.

brews.name: Jam
brews.description: A golden, US style session IPA with heaps of mango flavour! A crackin addition to the sunshine.

brews.name: Juice Machine
brews.description: Succulent, tropical New England IPA, with mango, peach and passionfruit flavours.

brews.name: Pale Rider
brews.description: Award winning, iconic pale ale, brewed with finest American hops creating a smooth, juicy and moreish beer - a reyt drop!

brews.name: Sidekick
brews.description: A flagship pale, light and refreshing with a zesty citrus edge

brews.name: Sonoma
brews.description: A refreshing, sessionable, hazy pale ale to be shared, which shows Track's love for hops & the pursuit of pale perfection.
Arbor collab. Clear, resinous, and piney.

brews.name: Hen Cloud
brews.description: A limited edition delightful IPA, which is low in weight and high on taste.

brews.name: Isobar IPA
brews.description: Light and hoppy session IPA with a distinctive sharp taste and a sweet, fruity aroma.

brews.name: Jaipur
brews.description: A citrus dominated IPA, soft and smooth, yet building to a crescendo of hoppiness accentuated by honey.  Always very popular so get in quick!

brews.name: Lemon Grab
brews.description: A smooth-drinking, citrus-hopped session IPA, juiced with real lemons.

brews.name: Single Hop IPA
brews.description: With a strength hidden beneath its smooth caramel notes, it’s lately been layers of pungent Amarillo driving this beer. A heavy hit dry hop hit of T90s – whichever hop we use – is exactly why this classic American IPA is a go-to hop at the Brewery. Caramel, tangerine, orange citrus, tropical fruit and grapefruit – it’s got the lot and drinks very well.

brews.name: Very English IPA
brews.description: This celebration of the very best English Hops and Malts is burnt orange in colour with layers of pithy orange and sweet marmalade finishing with a robust bitterness.

brews.name: Ava
brews.description: A hoppy blonde ale with a continental lager kick creating a thirst quenching session ale with maximum flavour.

brews.name: Bridgewater Blonde
brews.description: A light, refreshing, English blonde ale. The perfect thirst quencher.

brews.name: 160 Anniversary
brews.description: Crisp, golden English ale

brews.name: Little Bollington
brews.description: A light, easy drinking, pale session bitter, with a crisp bitter finish.

brews.name: Strawberry Blonde
brews.description: A refreshing blonde ale with hints of citrus and grapefruit with an aftertaste of strawberry.

brews.name: Tilt
brews.description: A clean easy drinking blonde ale that bursts with a taste of the tropics.

brews.name: Unique Experimental Brew Number 5
brews.description: A new beer! It will be pale golden, 4% and brewed with 'Wolf' hops.

brews.name: Juno
brews.description: A copper ale with an abundance of hops

brews.name: Marmalade on Rye
brews.description: Fruity rye beer with light spiciness, flavoured with orange and caraway seeds.
Easy drinking & smooth best bitter with balanced malt, fruit & hop flavours.

brews.name: Blueberry Classic
brews.description: A wonderful straw coloured beer with a light hoppy aroma and a distinct blueberry aftertaste.

brews.name: Feckless
brews.description: A classic British best bitter, rich toffee and malts balance the wonderful flavour of the finest English hops. Complex, refined and moreish.

brews.name: Sir Phillip
brews.description: An original premium bitter; enduring in Wincle's line up and for good reason.

brews.name: Dark Mild
brews.description: A multi-award winning traditional North Western dark mild. Smooth and easy drinking.

brews.name: Black Honeycomb
brews.description: English Porter with Cinder Toffee

brews.name: Creme Bearlee
brews.description: Dessert lovers sit up and sip up! Roasty, toasty notes from dark malts partnered with sweet molasses and madagsacan vanilla.

brews.name: Pica Pica
brews.description: It pours a rich, deep black and white in colour so the name Pica Pica (scientific name for a Magpie) suited perfectly. Expect a balanced sweetness throughout with notes of roasted nuts and coffee.

brews.name: Yes
brews.description: YES! A beer for all occasions. A LOW Alc IPA that retains all its authentic beer goodness. Hoppy & juicy to the end.

brews.name: Pilsner
brews.description: Crisp, clean and offers a refreshing long lasting light bitter finish.

brews.name: Pucker Face vol 2
brews.description: Biscuit malt, a soft lactose sweetness, and zingy lime bring this pale wheat beer to life. Cloudy and refeshing.

brews.name: Timperley Saison
brews.description: A traditional farmhouse style Saison. Fermented with Belgian yeast & made with fresh, locally foraged, Rhubarb & Elderflower.

brews.name: Raison d'Etre
brews.description: Combining two titanic bittersweet apples, this dry cider is fermented in oak barrels to give its distinctive award winning taste

brews.name: Dance Commander
brews.description: A delicious tangy & fruity beast, combining wild cider apple & sour cherry

brews.name: Shimmy
brews.description: A tart but tasty, refreshing blend of Cider, Lemon & Pineapple

brews.name: Dabbler
brews.description: A medium sparkling single variety cider from dabble

brews.name: Disco
brews.description: A delicious light & refreshing medium cider, perfect for a summers day

brews.name: Red Eye
brews.description: A medium sweet sparkling cider from a blend of dessert, bittersweet & cider apples.

gins.name: Passionfruit & Vanilla
gins.description: A combination of tangy passion fruit paired with creamy vanilla blossom.

gins.name: Rhubarb & Lavender
gins.description: Distinctive rhubarb with a subtle floral finish.

gins.name: Mango and Gunpowder
gins.description: A flavour that's equal parts exotic and familiar.

gins.name: Natsu Peach Gin
gins.description: Fruity & sweet, with a robust gin core.

gins.name: Blood Orange
gins.description: A refreshing summer drink to revive your senses.

gins.name: Raspberry
gins.description: A palate of raspberry at the front with Juniper and spices at the back

gins.name: Pink Grapefruit
gins.description: Zesty pink grapefruit vigour.

gins.name: Exquisite Citrus Gin
gins.description: Delicious exotic aroma with a dry refreshing taste.

gins.name: Key Lime Pie
gins.description: Lemon thyme & dandelion with fresh lime zest.

gins.name: Rhubarb Gin
gins.description: Distilled with juniper, cassia, cinnamon, sweet orange peel and fresh ginger.

gins.name: Raspberry & Blueberry
gins.description: A citrus pink gin which combines sweet berries and juniper to deliver a taste sensation.

gins.name: Apple Crumble
gins.description: Juniper, baked apple, cinnamon, rich toasted oats

gins.name: Rhubarb & Rosehip
gins.description: Tangy yet sweet rhubarb blended with fruits of the rose.

gins.name: Classic Cheshire Gin
gins.description: Classic gin packed full of flavor.

gins.name: London Dry Gin
gins.description: Packed with botanicals to tantalise your taste buds.

gins.name: Classic English Gin
gins.description: A mix of over ten carefully selected botanicals native to the Lake District National Park.

gins.name: Matron's Strength
gins.description: This navy strength concoction coats the palate and warms your cockles.

gins.name: Cheshire Craft Gin
gins.description: Bold and spicy, an award-winning gin

gins.name: Sweet Briar Gin
gins.description: Bright, fruity flavours, reminiscent of wild, rosy hedgerows and bramble thickets

gins.name: Jasmine & Rose
gins.description: Inspired by summer days spent in the garden

gins.name: Haru Blossom
gins.description: A pink gin flavoured with fleeting springtime cherry blossoms.

gins.name: Spiced Craft Gin
gins.description: A spiced gin. Heavy in juniper and coriander but with a nose of spices such as cloves, ginger & cinnamon

gins.name: Spirit of George English Dry Gin
gins.description: This hand-crafted gin, deliciously dry with a hint of Himalayan tea, has been created and perfected in Mobberley, Cheshire.

gins.name: Oriental Spiced London Dry
gins.description: Unique spiced gin – some like it hot!

gins.name: Dandelion, Chicory & Banana Leaf
gins.description: The plants used to feed the animals are now the same plants which are feeding the spirit of this gin.

gins.name: Alpine Dry Gin
gins.description: Japan-inspired gin crafted in Cheshire.

gins.name: Flor de Sevilla
gins.description: Zesty, fruitful flavouring, offering a bold and bittersweet taste of the sun-soaked Mediterranean

gins.name: Pink Berry
gins.description: Flavoured with extracts of raspberry, blackcurrant sage, ginger and chilli

gins.name: Non-alcoholic spirit
gins.description: What to drink when you're not drinking.
